name: white-flute
effect: Used outside of battle : Doubles the wild Pokémon encounter rate.
short_effect: Doubles the wild Pokémon encounter rate.

flavor_text.black-white: A toy flute made from white glass. A maniac will buy it for a high price.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: A toy flute made from white glass. A maniac will buy it for a high price.
